db:abstract.db:para: The Star Delegate example shows how to create a delegate that can paint itself and that supports editing.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
HEADERS = stardelegate.h \ stareditor.h \ starrating.h SOURCES = main.cpp \ stardelegate.cpp \ stareditor.cpp \ starrating.cpp
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/itemviews/stardelegate INSTALLS += target
